title: Just wondering
body: Since when was it a good idea to make a long range Jarvan ult a basic ability on a lower cooldown? *cough cough* *cough YORRIK*

replies.body: Doesn't do damage, destructible, still able to mobility out of it. It's his last max spell so it goes down in two hits until level 15. Then 3 until 17, then 4 until 18. By then you're team fighting and it's easy to break if you don't just get out of it via dash.
